</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets wanted position and size for 2D control animation. Width and height are optional. [[ctrlCommit]] is required to complete the operation. For 3D control, param is relative [x, y, z] and no [[ctrlCommit]] is required as it cannot be animated. If target control is inside a [[CT_CONTROLS_GROUP]], the position needs to be relative to it.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> controlName '''ctrlSetPosition''' [x, y]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  controlName: [[Control]] - 2D control

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> x: [[Number]] - Position in x

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> y: [[Number]] - Position in y

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> controlName '''ctrlSetPosition''' [x, y, w, h]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  controlName: [[Control]] - 2D control

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> x: [[Number]] - Position in x

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> y: [[Number]] - Position in y

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> w: [[Number]] - Width of the control

</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> h: [[Number]] - Height of the control

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value> controlName '''ctrlSetPosition''' [x, y, z]

</value></part><part><name>p41</name>=<value>  controlName: [[Control]] - 3D control

</value></part><part><name>p42</name>=<value> x: [[Number]] - Position in x

</value></part><part><name>p43</name>=<value> y: [[Number]] - Position in y (Distance from the screen)

</value></part><part><name>p44</name>=<value> z: [[Number]] - Position in z

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Move control: <code>_control2D [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0, 0];
_control2D [[ctrlCommit]] 0;</code>
		  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Move control and resize:<code>_control2D [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0, 0, 1, 1];
_control2D [[ctrlCommit]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_control3D [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0.5, 1, 0.5]; //centered and 1m away from screen</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Typewriter effect: <code>[[with]] [[uiNamespace]] [[do]] 	
{ 
	[] [[spawn]]
	{
		_text1 = "This is a simple demo of typewriter text effect with various speed.";
		_text2 = "This took 10 seconds.";
		_text3 = "This is a fast one, set for 2 seconds.";
		
		ctrl = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscStructuredText", -1];
		
		ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,0,0.1];
		ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
		ctrl [[ctrlSetStructuredText]] [[parseText]] [[format]] ["<t color='#ff0000' size='2.1'>%1</t>", _text1 [[splitString]] " " [[joinString]] "&amp;#160;"];
		ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,[[ctrlTextWidth]] ctrl,0.1];
		ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 8;
		
		[[waitUntil]] {[[ctrlCommitted]] ctrl};
		[[sleep]] 0.5;
		
		ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,0,0.1];  
		ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
		ctrl [[ctrlSetStructuredText]] [[parseText]] [[format]] ["<t color='#ff0000' size='2.1'>%1</t>", _text2 [[splitString]] " " [[joinString]] "&amp;#160;"];
		ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,[[ctrlTextWidth]] ctrl,0.1];
		ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 2;
		
		[[waitUntil]] {[[ctrlCommitted]] ctrl};
		[[sleep]] 2;
		
		ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,0,0.1];  
		ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
		ctrl [[ctrlSetStructuredText]] [[parseText]] [[format]] ["<t color='#00ff00' size='2.1'>%1</t>", _text3 [[splitString]] " " [[joinString]] "&amp;#160;"];
		ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,[[ctrlTextWidth]] ctrl,0.1]; 
		ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 2;
		
		[[waitUntil]] {[[ctrlCommitted]] ctrl};
		[[sleep]] 2;
		
		[[ctrlDelete]] ctrl;
	};
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlCommit]] [[ctrlCreate]] [[ctrlDelete]] [[ctrlModel]] [[ctrlSetModel]] [[ctrlPosition]] [[ctrlClassName]] [[displayCtrl]] [[ctrlModelScale]] [[ctrlSetModelScale]] [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]] [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]]
